email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN STAR available for a wheat shipment from Santos to Rotterdam. The vessel has a DWT of 85000 and an LOA of 230m. The initial freight rate is $48/MT on CIF terms. The laycan is set for October 10-15.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Sea Brokers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Could you consider lowering it to $45/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best,
Emily Carter
Blue Horizon Charter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-standing relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of $46/MT. The demurrage rate is $10,000 per day, and the loading window is 36 hours.

Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Sea Brokers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the $46/MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Emily Carter
Blue Horizon Charter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on October 10, with a 36-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Sea Brokers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Emily Carter
Blue Horizon Charter
